creature.title: Air Elemental, Lesser

block.name: Phantom on the Wind
block.line: The lesser air elemental becomes invisible whenever it starts its turn without an enemy adjacent to it. The invisibility lasts until the end of its next turn, or until after it has made an attack, whichever comes first.

block.name: Slam
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); +6 vs. AC
Hit: 1d6 + 3 damage.

block.name: Grasp of Storms
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature that can't see the air elemental); +4 vs. Reflex
Hit: 2d6 + 4 damage, and the air elemental grabs the target (until escape) if it does not have a creature grabbed.
Until the grab ends, the target takes ongoing 5 damage, and any melee or ranged attack that deals damage to the air elemental also deals one-half the damage to the target.

creature.description: Whirling winds and debris rising from the ground are the only signs of of this small elemental's presence

creature.title: Dust Devil Wisp
creature.defmod: -2 to all defenses when slowed or immobilized

block.name: Grasping Winds
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); +4 vs. Reflex
Hit: 4 damage, and the dust devil slides the target 2 squares.
Effect: The dust devil shifts 1 square.

block.name: Stinging Sands
block.line: Attack: Close burst 2 (creatures in the burst); +3 vs. Fortitude
Elementals with the earth subtype are immune to this attack
Hit: 6 damage, and the target is blinded until the end of the dust devil's next turn.
Miss: The target takes a -2 penalty to triggered attack rolls until the end of the dust devil's next turn.

creature.description: A weak living mote of elemental air, a dust devil wisp buffets the sands around it to blind its enemies.

creature.title: Fire Elemental, Lesser

block.name: Body of Fire
block.line: The fire elemental sheds bright light for 5 squares around it, and dim light for an additional 5 squares. When it takes cold damage, both distances are reduced to 2 squares until the end of its next turn.

block.name: Frozen in Place
block.line: Whenever the fire elemental takes cold damage, it cannot shift until the end of its next turn.

block.name: Heart of Flame
block.line: Whenever an enemy adjacent to the fire elemental misses it with a melee attack, that enemy takes 3 fire damage.

block.name: Slam
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); +4 vs. Reflex
Hit: Ongoing 5 fire daá¸¿age (save ends).
Crit: The target takes a -5 penalty to the first save it makes against this ongoing damage.

block.name: Flickering Flame
block.line: Effect: The fire elemental shifts 1 square.

creature.description: This campfire-sized creature of flame hungers for fresh fuel, darting towards new enemies to ignite, the crackling flames almost like a cackle as another creature burst aflame
